Validation Rules¶

This document defines validation rules between items and record types. The domain of individual items is defined in Record formats.

Current Validations¶

Practitioner¶

  • Practitioner - Year of Birth must not be in the future

  • Practitioner - Year of Birth must be after 1900

  • Practitioner - ATSI Cultural Training is only allowed to be set to ‘3 - Not required’ if Practitioner - Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Status is one of

    • 1 - Aboriginal but not Torres Strait Islander origin
    • 2 - Torres Strait Islander but not Aboriginal origin
    • 3 - Both Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander origin

    or

    The organistion to which the practitioner belongs has Provider Organisation - Type set to ‘8: Aboriginal Health/Medical Service’

Client¶

  • Client - Statistical Linkage Key must but 14, 32 or 40 characters long

  • Client - Proficiency in Spoken English response ‘0: Not applicable (persons under 5 years of age or who speak only English)’ is only allowed where

    • Client - Main Language Spoken at Home is ‘1201: English’, or
    • Client - Estimated Date of Birth Flag is ‘1: Date of birth is accurate’ and the person is under 5, or
    • Client - Estimated Date of Birth Flag is ‘2: Date of birth is an estimate’ and the person is under 6

    Where Client - Estimated Date of Birth Flag is ‘8: Date of birth is a dummy’ or ‘9: Accuracy of stated date of birth is not known’ Client - Proficiency in Spoken English is not checked.

  • Client - Date of Birth must not be in the future

Episode¶

  • Episode - End Date must not be in the future

  • Episode - Referral Date must not be in the future

  • The Episode - End Date must be after the Episode - Referral Date

  • Where Service Contact - Final is recorded as ‘1: No further services are planned for the client in the current episode’, the date of the Service Contact - Final must be recorded as the Episode End Date

  • Where Service Contact - Final is recorded as ‘1: No further services are planned for the client in the current episode’, the Episode - Completion Status must be recorded using one of the ‘Episode closed’ responses (Response items 2-6)

  • Where an Episode - End Date has been recorded, there must be a service contact with Service Contact - Final set to ‘1: No further services are planned for the client in the current episode’

  • Where an Episode - End Date has been recorded, a later Service Contact - Date cannot be added

  • Episode - Area of usual residence, postcode must be a valid Australian postcode in the range 0200-0299, 0800-9999

  • Episode - Referrer Organisation Type must be set to ‘98: N/A - Self referral’ if and only if Episode - Referrer Profession is also ‘98: N/A - Self referral’

  • Only one episode is allowed to be open per client

  • On Episode - Principal Diagnosis and Episode - Additional Diagnosis the values:

    • 100: Anxiety disorders (ATAPS)
    • 200: Affective (Mood) disorders (ATAPS)
    • 300: Substance use disorders (ATAPS)
    • 400: Psychotic disorders (ATAPS)

    will only be allowed where data has been migrated from ATAPS. The above responses will only be allowed under the following conditions:

    • The Episode - Referral Date was before 1 July 2017
    • The Episode - Tags field must contain the !ATAPS flag

Service Contact¶

  • Service Contact - Date must not be in the future
  • Service Contact - Postcode must be a valid Australian postcode in the range 0200-0299, 0800-9999
  • If Service Contact - Modality is ‘0: No contact took place’ Service Contact - No Show must be ‘1: Yes’
  • If Service Contact - Modality is ‘0: No contact took place’ Service Contact - Postcode must be 9999
  • If Service Contact - Modality is ‘1: Face to Face’ Service Contact - Postcode must not be 9999
  • If Service Contact - Modality is ‘1: Face to Face’ Service Contact - Venue must not be ‘98: Not applicable (Service Contact Modality is not face to face)’
  • If Service Contact - Modality is not ‘1: Face to Face’ Service Contact - Postcode must be 9999
  • On Service Contact - Type the value ‘98: ATAPS’ will only be allowed where data has been migrated from ATAPS. The above response will only be allowed under the following conditions:
    • The Service Contact - Date was before 30 June 2018
    • The Episode - Tags field must contain the !ATAPS flag

K10+¶

  • Collection Occasion - Measure Date must be after Episode - Referral Date
  • Collection Occasion - Measure Date must not be in the future
  • If both item scores and a total score are specified, the item scores must add up to the total score

K5¶

  • Collection Occasion - Measure Date must be after Episode - Referral Date
  • Collection Occasion - Measure Date must not be in the future
  • If both item scores and a total score are specified, the item scores must add up to the total score

SDQ¶

  • Collection Occasion - Measure Date must be after Episode - Referral Date
  • Collection Occasion - Measure Date must not be in the future

Future Validations¶

Episode¶

  • Restrict ‘4: Complex care package’ for Episode - Principal Focus of Treatment Plan to selected PHN Lead Sites

SDQ¶

  • Use the table at SDQ to validate the items that are used in each version of the SDQ.
  • If both item scores, subscales and total score are specified, the item scores must agree with the subscales/total score.
